body: I'm kind of sad...aagrant99 still plays on the server but I miss him on a the forums. You guys know anyone who isn't active on the. Forums anymore?
body_tagged: I'm kind of sad...aagrant99 still plays on the server but I miss him on a the forums. You guys know anyone who isn't active on the. Forums anymore?
title: Anyone you know that has left the forums?

replies.body:
I can only think of Aagrant99. Such a great guy. :'(.

Also there is BennettXL, mooncat69, and KizzyFizzy.
replies.body_tagged:
I can only think of Aagrant99. Such a great guy. :'(.

replies.body:
Yeah, I really do miss him.
I don't know of anyone else, though :T
replies.body_tagged:
Yeah, I really do miss him.
I don't know of anyone else, though :T

replies.body: i miss aagrant, atleast he didnt leave avicus. I just saw him ingame
replies.body_tagged: i miss aagrant, atleast he didnt leave avicus. I just saw him ingame

replies.body:
RCMP and Bennett. 
I don't miss anyone else because I don't know him/her or that I've had problems with him/her. 
RCMP Didn't even tell us why he left. :'(

replies.body: xLininger. He was one of the most badass people ever.Even though I'm glad he is gone, anyone know what happened to godlords?
replies.body_tagged: xLininger. He was one of the most badass people ever.Even though I'm glad he is gone, anyone know what happened to godlords?

replies.body:
Nobody knows why, this were the last things he said on the Shovel Gang chat:

YEET - KingLininger #$hovelGang: niggas

Adrian #Doge: wot?

YEET - KingLininger #$hovelGang: I am gonna like

YEET - KingLininger #$hovelGang: Stop going on my computer

Adrian #Doge: why?

And he never responded :l

The last thing he said on the chat was:

[6/14/2014 8:05:13 PM] YEET - xLininger: $^#% Charles Barkely
[6/14/2014 8:05:21 PM] YEET - xLininger: If Allen Iverson were playing
[6/14/2014 8:05:37 PM] YEET - xLininger: it would be like 1.900 points
